players have advanced past part, after a week, including Stephen Long and some players will be fully assembled in Dongguan Hubei commence training.NBL qualifier is a single round robin 4-6 between the teams, the first two finishers and the last two NBL League qualifying game unfold eventually take the first two years of coming into the NBL league. nike free 3.0 v5 mujer Daiyong said tournament schedule has not been released. "As in previous years, but the process should be the end of July to play qualifying rounds will be conducted in early August promotion race, and Marco Polo's home initially set at Wuhan Institute of Physical Education. YORK April 30, 2014, NBA playoffs continue. Clippers beat Warriors 113-103 at home, with a total score of 3-2 series lead in going after "Recording door" shadow, the Clippers once again set sail, they reached 80% chance of the second round.In the history of the Clippers, the system only once in seven games with a 3-2 lead in the game, and that is the first round in 2012 and the Grizzlies seven games, the Clippers finally won. Although the Clippers less historical samples, but there are quite a lot of history on the Warriors game 2-3 behind. A total of nine in the series, the Warriors lost seven games in which only two series last 4-3 comeback.If the Warriors and Clippers data added to the Warriors and Clippers win lose classified as a class, then a total of 10 in the series, the Clippers win or lose up to 8 games Warriors, Warriors win only 2 field, which is after the origin of 80% of this figure.Digital beneficial not only for the Clippers, and the process of the game is also tilted toward the Clippers. Although the Warriors had twice before beating the Clippers, but that is being formed under accidental factors,

basically in the case of both normal play, the Warriors are difficult to resist the impact of the pace of the Clippers.The first game, Griffin's foul changed everything. Clippers All-Star forward played only 19 minutes in the case of 6 fouls suffered, but even so, the Warriors have only 4 points advantage to win, winning is very difficult indeed. But after two games, Griffin led the Clippers with two cities, with a 2-1 lead.Thenike free 3.0 v4 comprar fourth game, the Clippers because the boss door event recording Stirling led the team no fighting, inside the small Jordan lost the rule of force, accounted for only six rebounds, did not score. This game can not be as extreme strength of both the reference, although the victory over the Warriors with 21 points, tied the score.Alliance today announced results for the Stirling punishment, banned for life for the boss. This result is very satisfactory Clippers players, so the team renewed fighting. Although Griffin continued to perform poorly, but they still scare to win the game. Little Jordan 25 points and 18 rebounds, once again become restricted giant.Little Jordan in this series has the absolute importance, because the Warriors center Andrew Bogut injured, no one can fight the small Jordan outstanding ability. This is normal in both cases, the warrior to fight, but the reason the Clippers. Now the Clippers out of the troubled recording scandal, but also got the series of match points, there is nothing to prevent them from entering the second round it "For a grander sight, a higher level", in the latest calligraphy works, Jiangsu Tong Xi Chen Guangchuan team investor expectations for the team to write the new season. Experienced a setback last season, Tongxi not discouraged, the new season will continue to attack the CBA. To achieve this goal, Tongxi increase investment, the introduction of a series of offseason buy my blue, Xie Libin, Zhang treasure and other

reinforcements, Chen Guangchuan investors is that the new season will win the prize doubled.The same is also home to HefeiSome time ago, there was news, Tongxi intends to put the new season at home in Changzhou. Reporters learned that the matter has entered the practical stage. "Basically on a good, Changzhou home side began training staff." Tongxi one insider said. But in the end, Tongxi back home or to Hefei. Which, in the end what happened misfortune This is also from the last season Tongxi. At that time, in order to impact CBA, Tongxi will be home from years of Jiangning moved to Hefei, is to assess when the access points can have more RBI. But Chen Guangchuan still feel the team's home in Jiangsu better, after all, is a branch of Jiangsu Tongxi team in Jiangsu, they have a more solid fan base. According to the latest requirements of the CBA, a city can not have two CBA teams, taking into anike free 4.0 v2 hombre ccount future development, Tongxi not to return home or move Jiangning. So, Tongxi considered Changzhou. Changzhou particularly fond of basketball, from the Dragons last season on the popular level in Changzhou part of the home is evident. Tongxi and Changzhou aspects of the depth talks and eventually reached an agreement, a lot of work has already started, but the Chinese Basketball Association official papers so that all efforts were in vain.NBL Basketball Association in accordance with the provisions of access embodiments, the home team and the club if the title is not in the same region or city industrial and commercial registration, select the priority must satisfy two conditions at home: one, there is no set home NBL club the capital city or prefecture-level cities; Second, set up home in the capital city or prefecture-level cities have two consecutive years (or more). That, at least was in accordance with the provisions Tongxi home Hefei campaign two years before they can replace the home. In this
